title: Pudgy & Grunge
description: Another day, another attempt from Grunge the cat to finally eat Pudgy the parrot.
quote: Excuse me, but isn’t it customary for the jailbird to get one telephone call?
altHero: Grunge the cat in a chef’s hat holding Pudgy the parrot who is tied up
alt1: Pudgy the parrot singing in his cage
alt2: Grunge lounging on the top of grandm’s armchair
